caption: 🌟 Ready to level up your professional game? 🚀 Here are 5 essential tips to boost your productivity and make workdays feel a little less overwhelming! 🌈✨ Swipe through and discover strategies that really work! 👉 What’s your go-to productivity hack? Share in the comments! 💬 #WorkSmart #ProductivityTips

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

media_prompt: A tips social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: 🌟 Ready to level up your professional game? 🚀 Here are 5 essential tips to boost your productivity a, high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
